description: This is an RFP for the procurement of VALVE, BUTTERFLY item for the Department of National Defence under Solicitation Number W8482-242358/A. The delivery is scheduled for CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## Request for Proposal: Butterfly Valves

**Solicitation Number:** W8482-242358/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Category:** Good and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:** Directorate Maritime Procurement

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Jean-Pierre Normandin
* **Email:** jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (819) 939-3674
* **Country:** Canada
* **Address:** 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2

**Tender Description:**

The Department of National Defence is soliciting proposals for the procurement of two types of butterfly valves (Item 1 and Item 2) to be delivered to Canadian Forces Bases (CFB) Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia. The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and services.

**Items:**

* Item 1: GSIN 4820, NSN 21-908-2615, VALVE, BUTTERFLY, Part No. 80-66SL-177E-KV7177, NCAGE 38003, Canadian Worcester Controls, Quantity: 12, Unit of Issue: EA
* Item 2: Same as Item 1, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Deadline:**

Proposals must be submitted by 2:00 PM Eastern Time on January 18, 2024.

**Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Note:**

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and NCAGE of the proposed product.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments:**
* [request for proposal document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26722/rfp-w8482-242358-a-en.pdf)
* [amendment 1 (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26722/rfp-w8482-242358-a-amendment-1-en.pdf)
